author: Tom Warren
title: Microsoft opens up xCloud beta registration to 11 European countries
description: Microsoft is opening up its xCloud game streaming service to 11 European countries. The software giant is gradually rolling it out due to internet bandwidth concerns in Europe admid the coroanvirus pandemic.
content:
Microsoft is rolling out the preview gradually due to coronavirus internet impact concerns
Microsoft is starting to open up its xCloud game streaming beta to countries across Europe. The software giant originally launched the xCloud preview in the US, UK, an… [+1467 chars]
